import React from "react"; import { FaCheck, FaThumbsDown, FaThumbsUp } from "react-icons/fa"; import WatchBtn from "../WatchBtn"; export default function MovieInfo({ movie }) { const genres = [ {"id":10759,"name":"Action & Adventure"},{"id":16,"name":"Animação"},{"id":35,"name":"Comédia"},{"id":80,"name":"Crime"},{"id":99,"name":"Documentário"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"},{"id":10751,"name":"Família"},{"id":10762,"name":"Kids"},{"id":9648,"name":"Mistério"},{"id":10763,"name":"News"},{"id":10764,"name":"Reality"},{"id":10765,"name":"Sci-Fi & Fantasy"},{"id":10766,"name":"Soap"},{"id":10767,"name":"Talk"},{"id":10768,"name":"War & Politics"},{"id":37,"name":"Faroeste"}] let firstDate = new Date(movie.first_air_date); return (

{movie.name}

{movie.vote_average} {firstDate.getFullYear()}
